title: misc/cgo/testcdefs doesn't work: C source files not allowed when not using cgo
body:
I'm new to Go, and I'm attempting to learn about how to interoperate between C and Go. I thought a good way to learn would be to go through some of the examples in the repo. However it appears that a change in Go 1.4 has made one of the examples not work anymore. Others seem to be having related issues: https://github.com/golang/go/issues/9132

https://github.com/golang/go/tree/master/misc/cgo/testcdefs

```
$ go version
go version go1.4 darwin/amd64
$ cd misc/cgo/testdefs
$ ./test.bash 
can't load package: package .: C source files not allowed when not using cgo: cdefstest.c main.c
```
